snippet: Publishers of online video at the Digital Content NewFronts indicated they were trying to make it easier for marketers and agencies to spend on video.
abstract: Advertising column; annual 2014 Digital Content Newfronts presentation, organized by Interactive Advertising Bureau, ends with publishers seeking to keep momentum going by making it easier for marketers and agencies to spend advertising dollars on online video.
lead_paragraph: Publishers of online video at the Digital Content NewFronts indicated they were trying to make it easier for marketers and agencies to spend on video.

headline.main: For Online Video Publishers, a New Tack on Luring Ad Dollars
headline.print_headline: For Online Video Publishers, a New Tack on Luring Ad Dollars
